Koga Shuko/Anubis/Sixshot:



Koga Shuko raised his rocket launcher, firing a missile off at the hull of 
the Ark.

---

Anubis fired 3 optic blasts off at the Ark.

---

Sixshot was now in the air.  Getting a target lock, he fired a burst of 21 
rapid laser bursts off at the Ark in strafing run.

---
